[See All MEINL Unique Hand Drums](/Meinl/Unique-Hand-Drums.gc) Description The white-frosted Meinl Sonic Energy Crystal Singing Bowls are made of high-purity quartz to create a very pleasant aura with their sound and design. A long-lasting, spherical tone spreads when the singing bowl is gently tapped or rubbed. All Crystal Singing Bowls are delivered with a silicone ring to avoid possible impact and to ensure the best resonance. The corresponding navel chakra promotes peace, inner harmony and serenity. Features - Made of high-purity quartz - White-frosted - Extremely long-lasting resonance - 432 Hz Warranty One year replacement, parts, and labor warranty on all percussion products.
